description: This table contains information that is useful for linking records (patient, department, etc.) to their appropriate events.

columns.name: EVENT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the event record. This column is frequently used to link to the ED_IEV_EVENT_INFO table.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this line. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: ITEMS_EDITED_TIME
columns.description: The date and time when this event record was last edited.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: The last date and time the event record was extracted.

columns.name: PAT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique, internal contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of the contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: DTE_EXTERNAL
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across patients and encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: PAT_ENC_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique, internal patient contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of the contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: DEPT_EVENT_DEP_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the department that is associated with this event record. Note: this item is populated only for department-level events.

columns.name: RECORD_STATE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The record state category number for the event record. Link this column to the ZC_PBA_REC_STAT table to look up the corresponding record state values.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Active


Inactive


Deleted


Inactive and Deleted


Hidden


Inactive and Hidden


Deleted and Hidden


Inactive Deleted and Hidden

columns.name: TRANSFER_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The transfer status category number for medication reconciliation events.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Active


Canceled


Completed

columns.name: CREATE_DTTM
columns.description: The instant when the event record was created.

columns.name: CREATE_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user who created the event record.

columns.name: EVENT_DATE
columns.description: The date the event record was created.

columns.name: PAT_CSN
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across patients and encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: ADT_TRANSFER_LINK
columns.description: Virtual item for the Admission, Transfer, Discharge, or Leave of Absence (ADT) event link for a medication reconciliation transfer.

columns.name: REG_CLIP_FREETEXT
columns.description: User-entered patient name for patient added to clipboard. User-entered text is necessary for users without security to select real patients or for new patients.

columns.name: REG_CLIP_COMMENTS
columns.description: Comments for the patient added to the Patients Waiting Registration Clipboard

columns.name: IP_ORDREC_SORT_DTTM
columns.description: This is the instant that all the orders in the event should be sorted by, instead of using their individual ordering session keys or ordering instants.

columns.name: REG_WAIT_STATE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Holds the state of the record that holds Registration wait list info.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Unidentified Patient


Identified Patient


Identified Encounter


Removed

columns.name: REG_WAIT_PAT_NAME
columns.description: Holds the user-entered patient name for a patient who is waiting but has not yet been identified.

columns.name: REG_WAIT_IS_PRI_YN
columns.description:
Holds the priority value for a patient who is waiting to be registered.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: REG_WAIT_ARRV_DTTM
columns.description: Holds the earliest event instant, which will indicate the time the patient arrived for the encounter this event list is associated with.

columns.name: AVS_COPY_FORWARD_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time that a user copied After Visit Summary documentation from another encounter into this one.

columns.name: AVS_COPY_FORWARD_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user who copied After Visit Summary documentation from another encounter into this one.
